original_text: The woman must not have had a husband who died. She must not have a husband that she has left. Men must not have paid to have sex with her. She must be a woman from Israel's people, 15 so that their children will be holy. I am the Lord. I make priests holy.’
korean_text: 과부나 이혼 당한 여자나 창녀 짓을 하는 더러운 여인을 취하지 말고 자기 백성 중에서 처녀를 취하여 아내를 삼아

sentences.original_text: The woman must not have had a husband who died.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여자는 죽은 남편이 있어서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: She must not have a husband that she has left.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 떠나온 남편이 있어서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: Men must not have paid to have sex with her.
sentences.korean_translation: 남자들이 그녀와 성관계를 위해 돈을 지불해서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: She must be a woman from Israel's people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 이스라엘 백성 중에서 온 여자여야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: so that their children will be holy.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들의 자녀들이 거룩하게 될 것입니다.
